lead_paragraph: Marcel Kittel burst back into the limelight when the German snatched his ninth Tour de France stage win on Tuesday, prevailing in a tough bunch sprint.

headline.print_headline: Kittel Back at the Top With Tour Win, Sagan Retains Yellow
headline.main: Kittel Back at the Top With Tour Win, Sagan Retains Yellow
